content: For the full year, we were very pleased to move that full year guidance up, part of that is built on what we’re seeing -- or what we saw, what were able to achieve in the first quarter, but also a refined look at the balance of the last three quarters of the fiscal year. We’re going to -- generally speaking, as raw materials go down, we have to give up some of that cost, but we won’t be able to give up all of those prices -- increases that we have because of the fact that costs are basically higher and talking specifically here in the U.S.
